TradingGainsLosses.label: Trading Gain (Loss)
TradingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) resulting from the difference between the acquisition price and the selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, conducted separately from customer trading activities. Includes, but is not limited to, changes in fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities.

TransferInvestments.label: Transfer Investments (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
TransferInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred in noncash transactions.

TransferOfInvestments.label: Transfer from Investments
TransferOfInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred from the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

TransferToInvestments.label: Transfer to Investments
TransferToInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Acquisition
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from acquisitions.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Five
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: Amount of fixed and determinable portion of unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: Amount of the unrecorded obligation to transfer funds in the future for fixed or minimum amounts or quantities of goods or services at fixed or minimum prices (for example, as in take-or-pay contracts or throughput contracts).

UnusedCommitmentsToExtendCredit.label: Unused Commitments to Extend Credit
UnusedCommitmentsToExtendCredit.description: Unused amount of commitments to extend credit to customers.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Cost and Expense
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToO.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Other Account
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToO.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to accounts other than cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Deduction
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesRecoveries.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Addition, Recovery
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesRecoveries.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from recovery of amount previously written off or reestablishment of reserve previously utilized.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaNetIncomeLos.label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Net Income (Loss)
BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaNetIncomeLos.description: The pro forma net Income or Loss for the period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of a period.

BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaRevenue.label: Business Acquisition, Pro Forma Revenue
BusinessAcquisitionsProFormaRevenue.description: The pro forma revenue for a period as if the business combination or combinations had been completed at the beginning of the period.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Exercise of Option, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesHeldT.label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity
InterestAndDividendIncomeSecuritiesHeldT.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on held-to-maturity securities.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

InterestExpenseDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Deposits
InterestExpenseDeposits.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

InterestExpenseLongTermDebt.label: Interest Expense, Long-term Debt
InterestExpenseLongTermDebt.description: Aggregate amount of interest paid or due on all long-term debt.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InterestExpenseShortTermBorrowings.label: Interest Expense, Short-term Borrowings
InterestExpenseShortTermBorrowings.description: The aggregate interest expense incurred on short-term borrowings including commercial paper and Federal funds purchased and securities sold under agreements to repurchase.

InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesAvailableFor.label: Interest Income, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Operating
InterestIncomeDebtSecuritiesAvailableFor.description: Amount of interest income, amortization of premium and accretion of discount on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale); classified as operating.

InterestIncomeOther.label: Interest Income, Other
InterestIncomeOther.description: Amount of interest income earned from interest bearing assets classified as other.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Including Current Maturities
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, including portion classified as current.

ProceedsFromSaleOfFederalReserveStock.label: Proceeds from Sale of Federal Reserve Bank Stock
ProceedsFromSaleOfFederalReserveStock.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositTimeDeposi.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Time Deposits
InterestBearingDomesticDepositTimeDeposi.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic time deposits. Time deposits bear interest for a fixed, stated period of time and include certificate of deposits and individual retirement accounts.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Asset
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount of asset associated with funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price.

ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Short-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, at Point in Time
ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of short-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.

AdvancesFromFederalHomeLoanBanks.label: Advances from Federal Home Loan Banks
AdvancesFromFederalHomeLoanBanks.description: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date from the Federal Home Loan Bank, which are primarily used to cover shortages in the required reserve balance and liquidity shortages.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Amount Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Asset
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount of asset associated with derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.label: Derivative Liability, Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Securities Loaned, Gross
DerivativeLiabilitySecuritiesSoldUnderAg.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

InterestExpenseOtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Interest Expense, Other Short-term Borrowings
InterestExpenseOtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on other short-term borrowings.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherRealEstate.label: Other Real Estate
OtherRealEstate.description: Carrying amount of other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This does not include real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

OtherShortTermBorrowings.label: Other Short-term Borrowings
OtherShortTermBorrowings.description: Amount of borrowings classified as other, maturing within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.label: Proceeds from FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
ProceedsFromFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.description: Amount of cash inflow from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.label: Payments of FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.description: Amount of cash outflow for repayment of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherShortTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYe.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Remainder of Fiscal Year
TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYe.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit.

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

ContractWithCustomerReceivableAfterAllow.label: Contract with Customer, Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
ContractWithCustomerReceivableAfterAllow.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeLastOfLayerCumu.label: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge, Last-of-Layer, Cumulative Increase (Decrease)
HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeLastOfLayerCumu.description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk, in last-of-layer hedging relationship.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

ContractWithCustomerAssetGross.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, before Allowance for Credit Loss
ContractWithCustomerAssetGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer, when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Research, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to research tax credit.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.label: Operating Lease, Impairment Loss
OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from impairment of right-of-use asset from operating lease.

WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositCertif.label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Certificates of Deposit
WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositCertif.description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic certificates of deposit liabilities.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans Receivable
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

CommissionsPayableToBrokerDealersAndClea.label: Commissions Payable to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
CommissionsPayableToBrokerDealersAndClea.description: Amount payable to broker-dealers or clearing organizations for executing or clearing trades or orders.

DepositsPaidForSecuritiesBorrowedAtCarry.label: Deposits Paid for Securities Borrowed, at Carrying Value
DepositsPaidForSecuritiesBorrowedAtCarry.description: This is the amount of cash advanced as security in return for borrowing securities from another party.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax credits. Including, but not limited to, research credit, foreign tax credit, investment tax credit, and other tax credits.

HedgedAssetFairValueHedge.label: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge
HedgedAssetFairValueHedge.description: Amount of asset hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

HedgedLiabilityFairValueHedge.label: Hedged Liability, Fair Value Hedge
HedgedLiabilityFairValueHedge.description: Amount of liability hedged in fair value hedging relationship.

HedgedLiabilityFairValueHedgeCumulativeI.label: Hedged Liability, Fair Value Hedge, Cumulative Increase (Decrease)
HedgedLiabilityFairValueHedgeCumulativeI.description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged liability in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk.

IncreaseDecreaseOfRestrictedInvestments.label: Increase (Decrease) of Restricted Investments
IncreaseDecreaseOfRestrictedInvestments.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with investments (not to include restricted cash) that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

OtherPayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingO.label: Other Payables to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
OtherPayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingO.description: Amount of other payables due to broker-dealers or clearing organizations.

ReceivablesFromClearingOrganizations.label: Receivables from Clearing Organizations
ReceivablesFromClearingOrganizations.description: Amount of right to receive cash and securities on deposit with clearing organizations. Clearing organizations perform post trade processing and trade comparisons among numerous broker-dealers and act as settlement agents between buying and selling broker-dealers.

SecuritiesFailedToDeliver.label: Securities Failed-to-Deliver
SecuritiesFailedToDeliver.description: Amount receivable as the result of a fail-to-deliver. A fail-to-deliver is a securities sale to another broker-dealer that has not been delivered to buying broker-dealer by the close of business on the settlement date.

SecuritiesFailedToReceive.label: Securities Failed-to-Receive
SecuritiesFailedToReceive.description: Amount payable as the result of fail-to-receive. A fail-to-receive is a securities purchase from another broker-dealer not received from the selling broker-dealer by the close of business on the settlement date.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

CashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeReclassifiedWit.label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) to be Reclassified within Twelve Months
CashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeReclassifiedWit.description: The estimated net amount of existing gains or losses on cash flow hedges at the reporting date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next 12 months.

HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeCumulativeIncre.label: Hedged Asset, Fair Value Hedge, Cumulative Increase (Decrease)
HedgedAssetFairValueHedgeCumulativeIncre.description: Amount of cumulative increase (decrease) in fair value of hedged asset in fair value hedge, attributable to hedged risk.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.
